sen.j: 蛸薬師通（たこやくしどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Takoyakushi-dori Street is an east-west running street of Kyoto City.
The Takoyakushi-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
The Takoyakushi-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は河原町通から西は佐井通の西の西院小学校付近まで。
sen.e: It extends from the Kawaramachi-dori Street in the east to Saiin Elementary School west of the Sai-dori Street in the west.
It extends from the Kawaramachi-dori Street in the east, and in the west to Saiin Elementary School, which is west of Sai-dori Street.
It extends from the Kawaramachi-dori Street in the east, and in the west to Saiin Elementary School, which is west of Sai-dori Street.

sen.j: 途中壬生川通と御前通の間では京都市営バス車庫やJR山陰本線など数箇所で分断されている。
sen.e: The section between the Mibugawa-dori Street and the Onmae-dori Street is interrupted by a few areas such as a tram of Kyoto City Bus and R Saninhonsen Line.
The section between Mibugawa-dori Street and Onmae-dori Street is interrupted by a few areas such as a Kyoto City Bus tram and the R Saninhonsen Line.
The section between Mibugawa-dori Street and Onmae-dori Street is interrupted by a few areas such as a Kyoto City Bus depot and the JR Sanin Main Line.
sen.cmt: R Saninhonsen Line→JR Sanin Main Line, Kyoto City Bus tram→Kyoto City Bus depotに修正

sen.j: 平安京の四条坊門小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Shijobomonkoji of the Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Shijobomonkoji of the Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Shijobomonkoji of the Heiankyo.

sen.j: 「蛸薬師」の名は新京極通にある永福寺 (京都市)の本尊薬師如来の俗称に由来する。
sen.e: The name "Takoyakushi" comes from the common name of Yakushinyorai/Bhaisajyaguru in Eifuku-ji Temple (Kyoto City) located along the Shinkyogoku-dori Street.
The name "Takoyakushi" comes from the common name of Yakushinyorai/Bhaisajyaguru in Eifuku-ji Temple (Kyoto City) located along Shinkyogoku-dori Street.
The name 'Takoyakushi' comes from the common name of Yakushinyorai (Bhaisajyaguru) in Eifuku-ji Temple (Kyoto City) located along Shinkyogoku-dori Street.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更、Yakushinyorai/Bhaisajyaguru→Yakushinyorai (Bhaisajyaguru)としました。

sen.j: 河原町通と新京極通の間は少し南に寄り、これらの通りから続く繁華街になっている。
sen.e: The section between the Kawaramachi-dori Street and the Shinkyogoku-dori Street deviates slightly southward and constitutes a shopping district that continues from these streets.
The section between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Shinkyogoku-dori Street deviates slightly southward and constitutes a shopping district that continues on past these streets.
The section between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Shinkyogoku-dori Street deviates slightly southward and constitutes a shopping district that continues on past these streets.

sen.j: 河原町通から寺町通までが路上喫煙等禁止区域である。
sen.e: The street between the Kawaramachi-dori Street and the Teramachi-dori Street is a Public Nonsmoking Area.
The street between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Teramachi-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.
The street between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Teramachi-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.

sen.j: 丸寿 西村商店 - 行列のできる焼き芋屋。
sen.e: Maruju Nishimura-shoten, a baked sweet potato vender in front of which there is a line of people.
Maruju Nishimura-shoten, a popular baked sweet potato vendor often hosts a line of people waiting.
Maruju Nishimura-shoten, a popular baked sweet potato vendor often hosts a line of people waiting.

sen.j: 壬生車庫（京都市交通局）
sen.e: Mibu Garage (Kyoto City Transportation Bureau)

sen.j: 京都市立堀川高等学校
sen.e: Kyoto Municipal Horikawa Senior High School
